span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 无关紧要的： of little or no consequence; inconsequential
【例】 the book's contributions to Shakespearean scholarship are nugatory 【近】 incidental, inconsequential, inconsiderable, insignificant, negligible, trifling, trivial
【反】 consequential, eventful, important, major, meaningful, momentous, significant, substantial, unfrivolous, weighty 重要的
【记】 形意类似 negative 否定，消极的
【另】 niggle 为琐事费心, 拘泥小节
